name: Run Cyber, Run!
description:
A 2.5D runner made for #cyberpunkjam

Win/Mac/Linux:

Default controls: Space to jump, esc to pause, mouse for menu.

USB pad compatible!

OUYA build available here or on Discover store.

Changelog v1.1:

Fixed a bug that spawned too many spikes on restart.

Android users - if you try this game please consider filling out the feedback form at

http://stevenhoskins.com/runCyberRun.html
